website_summaries.verdict: Sony continues to crank out nice compact cameras with long zoom lenses, and the Cyber-shot DSC-HX10V is no exception.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX10V is a feature-filled compact megazoom with very good photo and video quality and a useful zoom lens
cons: The HX10V's 18-megapixel resolution is more about marketing than image quality
Many of its shooting modes require multishot processing, which slows you down and can't be used with moving subjects

customer_reviews.title: I kept it in case at all times and it took excellent care of it and one day I went to ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this company a negative star I would. I bought this camera in October, 2017 and It ALREADY BROKE!!!!! (It’s only March, 2018)... 5 months later.. I kept it in case at all times and it took excellent care of it and one day I went to Use it and it wouldn’t turn on... it’s completly deAd despite the battery being fully charged. I emailed the company and they refused to return it or even offer to fix it. So basically this was a complete waste! SAVE your money and buy elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: STILL rocking it, 4 years later
customer_reviews.text: I originally picked this up in June of 2012. Now, almost 4 years later, this thing has been through so much with me it's not funny. I have no problem getting 'cheap seats' at shows now. Why? I can actually SEE and record from no matter how high up. The clarity on this thing is out of this world! My only complaint? Their aftermarket battery policies just suck. Yes, I get that they want you to buy THEIR batteries, but disabling aftermarket batteries is just bad, all around.
customer_reviews.author: T. Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Sharp photos, good long distance lens
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera a year ago and it's taken me a while to get use to it. My photos have almost always been sharp and the colors are deep and rich. I recommend this camera for its size (I can fit it into my side pocket) and sharp photos. I still have to use the on-line directions sometimes, too many features to remember. Only con with the camera is that it doesn't have a quick-easy manual and the flash is located in a bad spot (it's right where I hold the camera).
customer_reviews.author: from Alameda County

customer_reviews.title: Everything works perfectly-except...
customer_reviews.text: Camera works as advertised, taking clear shots with lots of settings to choose from, and a great panorama sweep mode. However, the small cover that closes the battery/memory card housing does not lock properly. I have had to resort to pasting a small piece of electrical tape across it in order for it to not pop open during operation! Since I was moving back overseas two days after receiving the camera, it wasn't worth it for me to contact the seller for a replacement...Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Zilzal

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: The settings are so cool! It takes great pictures for a point and shoot camera and you can hand it to a stranger and they wouldn't have a problem taking a picture with it. There are already a lot of detailed reviews for it so there is not much I could add other than I this it is easy to use and once you test out all the settings you will be a wiz at getting the type of picture you want.
customer_reviews.author: Michele D. Lantz

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera especially the panoramic shots
customer_reviews.text: I already have one of these but broke it during hiking. I love this camera especially the panoramic shots. This is why I am buying it again even though its used. I would recommend this camera to anyone but I sure that Sony does not make this model anymore but some really simliar should be just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Sure, you have new cellphone that takes great pictures, but they never took as a good picture as this camera will. Extreme low light conditions to high end fast action shots. The zoom is great. Excellent pocket camera without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: I'm trek'd

customer_reviews.title: High quality STILL and HD VIDEO from a Pocket-size camera
customer_reviews.text: The SONY HX-10 is an amazing little camera. Small and light yet produces very high quality still photos with great color and clatrity. Very good in-camera panoramas. Amazing HD videos. Can be tricky/difficult to use several advanced features/functions. Very poor PRINT MANUAL.
customer_reviews.author: Ted K

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Small camera with many, many resources and great performance. Before buying, we had seen films from this camera taken in Europe by a friend and felt we were almost there. The camera really films great shots of any scene in which you find yourself and want to share with friends. So small and easy to use. Remarkable!
customer_reviews.author: GaryBrazil

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber Shot dsc-hx10v
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived really fast, and it is a very good camera. It has many functions such as scene mode: food, perfect skin, pet, etc. The movies made have awesome quality, such as the photos taken. the batteries last a lot, even when you're making movies or taking pictures with flash. I have absolutely nothing to complain about it.
customer_reviews.author: Fausto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and takes super shots. Love the longer lens distance
customer_reviews.author: John Brunette

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Cyber-shot produces incredibly sharp pictures and the "wide angle" has come in handy. The product I ordered works well. I took it to Napa and have a beautiful collection of pictures. I also have taken pictures for real estate rentals as well. The wide angle gives a better view of small rooms than a standard lens. It's also easy to carry in a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Champignon

customer_reviews.title: beautiful pics and right features for price
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a camera that was inadvertently dropped into the surf. I really loved my prior model, but this HX10V takes wonderful shots and has all of the features that I use for everyday photography.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have EVER had
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I have EVER had, Sony you need to make these again! I bought one of your newer versions in april for my husband, and the quality was TERRIBLE! Bring this one back!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing this camera I had the Sony DSC-H70. I loved that camera. It was amazing so when someone broke into my house and it was stolen I was so upset. I had gotten a Nikon to replace it but it was terrible and I ended up returning it. Then I found this one and was ecstatic, plus it was on sale. Definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: bodineeeee

customer_reviews.title: Since the battery charger did not work, I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Since the battery charger did not work, I was unable to use the camera. I returned it for credit, but have heard nothing from Amazon regarding my refund.
customer_reviews.author: william gagnon

customer_reviews.title: Thsi is an excellent "everyday" camera.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my wife. She loves it. The camera is small enough to carry most of the time. Yet, the zoom is powerful enough to provide the ability to shoot a wide variety of setting. This camera gives outstanding indoors low light shots. Although, we own more expensive cameras the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX10V is used much more extensively.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a family member. Clear images, easy to use, decent price. Sony really has some great point and shoot cameras and this is one of their fantastic choices.
customer_reviews.author: David Stroz

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Overall
customer_reviews.text: The video quality on the camera is fantastic. A lot of great features. Still learning how to use them all, but so far I am very pleased with it. Also the zoom is fantastic. The only downfall I have found with this camera is the placement of the flash and also the EXTREME power of it! It tends to wash some pics out because it is SO bright. Overall, good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Warmbier

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Camera
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I need it to do. I take photos of my collection, of family moments, my pets, and every now and then photos when I travel. The video is STUNNING. It's not camcorder quality but it's great for the average user. Plus it's at least semi-customizable. I'm pretty knowledgeable about cameras and between the specs and performance the price is fantastic. I highly recommend this camera, the only thing I can't comment on is how well or long it holds up as I've only had it a week but I hope it lasts for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS CAMERA! I had a different camera recently that I loved but i broke it so I searched for a new one and found this, it works well for a novis like melooking to take great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse N.

customer_reviews.title: Supposed- over saturation
customer_reviews.text: This camera does not oversaturate colors-it looks that way on the lcd screen because it has so many color dots on it. When I download the pictures into I Photo-the pictures are perfect on the computer screen. I think people are seeing the camera screen and judging the colors etc. from that . But the colors are perfect and very sharp when seen on the computer. I had a sony hx9v-and got this because I missed all the things this camera can do. Also have an NEX3 Sony and LX7 panasonic and several Canons. For a point and shoot this is very good! It beats the sx230 Canon for sharpness and color-and also has so many extras!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Bissell

customer_reviews.title: Just arrived
customer_reviews.text: I'm having fun with this neat little camera! So far I'm loving the simplicity of it and the excellent photos.
customer_reviews.author: VE

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I luv this camera!!! Picture quality is 10+++ & so is lens! The 1 shortcoming I've found so far is the flash is in a poor spot! Your finger will stop it from popping up sometime due to its location. I still would reccomend it as the best point & shoot digital I've ever owned!!!
customer_reviews.author: RWH3354

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX10V 18.2mp 16x zoom
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for an upcoming vacation. Love all the different and advanced ways to take a photo. Have not used all features but anxious to try them. I liked the open close feature where the battery/card go in my HX5 better. The camera is a little heavier than the HX5 but a great upgrade to that model. Takes a little to get used to the battery popping up where you would hold camera, but flash is better than the older models.
customer_reviews.author: In to comfort and ease

customer_reviews.title: Product improves my picture-taking ability
customer_reviews.text: Though this camera has many features I will not use (3E, movies, etc.), its ability to provide me with sharp, color-rich photos is exceptional. I take many photos (too many) and do not want to be bothered with difficult technical details or instructions, and fortunately this camera's automatic default features make it very easy to ahieve outstanding results. I was very disappointed with the poorly written, poorly detailed brief instruction booklet that came with this unit, but went to the SONY Internet support site and got links to the printable information I need.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Huguenin

customer_reviews.title: The best camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: simply the best camera you can get for the Price.... It came as advertised and the product Works perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.author: terminatorf1000

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome camera. It does much more than what I initially purchased for. Many people have seen me use it and ask how they can get one
customer_reviews.author: mobile

customer_reviews.title: Excelente câmera portátil
customer_reviews.text: Um produto bastante útil (necessário), bom para as viagens que você nao quer carregar algo muito grande. Chegou dentro das especificações e no prazo. Podem comprar o produto.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Baima N Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact camera!
customer_reviews.text: Best picture quality and feature set of any non-SLR camera I've ever used. Highly recommended for travel and multi-purpose photography.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kabli

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Good Performance
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera and takes great pictures when used by an amature like me. Battery life is good and all the features were very nice For the function comes size and since I travel it does not fit into my pockets like a smaller camera I previously had But still a delight to use
customer_reviews.author: Tigger64

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Choose it for the 16x optical lens. It works very well in optical and digitial zoom. No problems in first 1500 pictures as long as I can steady the camera in extended digitial zoom. Movie mode and Panoramic mode both work very well. I have recommended the camera to fellow travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Needed more zoom for soccer action pictures
customer_reviews.text: Needed more zoom for soccer games--with this camera, I use it on forced flash every shot---zoomed in --then crop the shot in computer & the image is still very acceptable. Wish the camera had come with a out-to-TV wire. My previous Sony wire is a slightly larger connector Camera also makes a very acceptable video & can zoom in & out while recording. Very satisfied with this model --great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera
customer_reviews.text: Really is a great camera! Have not had any problems at all. The menu is a little bit trickey to figure out, but the camera performance truly is wonderful. Great supplier and top quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: it was exactly what i expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant camera for those who know how to use it! Don't buy it unless you know how to use a more sophisticated camera, this isn't your normal run of the mill point and shoot. It takes stunning photos and I just love it. For other camera jockeys out there, if your like me and you want to go straight for a DSLR but don't want to be fought in the "need more lenses" loop get this baby. Its not a DSLR but it has beautiful quality. Make sure you buy a good card for it though because it doesn't come with one!
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Had a fantastic first test run of this camera at Disneyland. Batter life was great despite repeated on/off/video and still usage. The panorama function was flawless, easy to use and made sterling images. The zoom is second to none and just when I thought I couldn't get close enough this camera was on top of it. Also standard imagery had a great wide angle when fully pulled back so it had a great range of views and perspectives. Pop up flash wasn't overly annoying and the camera was able to grab low light and bright light images in focus with no problems. Totally worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A Dulac

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a great camera but got a little better than OK. This all could be from the shipping because when I got the camera the box was open and there was a little rattle in the camera. Anyway I have returned and going to go back to Panasonic Lumix.
customer_reviews.author: CC Estimator

customer_reviews.title: After Use Review
customer_reviews.text: Sony as per the brand the quality and system use is good. It has the lots of features like background blur, one click HD Recording. Prons: Good picture quality. Easy to transfer. supports SD Cards. Cons: Flash, it pops up on the left top, it makes the discomfort for the user who clicks first time, they will hold it with both hands. connector, it is in the bottom, and always you need to keep your camera in sleep position while transferring to your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Rams

customer_reviews.title: Great compact
customer_reviews.text: This compact has full manual controls and takes great stills and movies. It's clearly designed for the more sophisticated photographer and would get 5 stars if it also offered raw files. But, it is still a fine camera for people wanting to expand their control beyond simple point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: William Greenblatt

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this camera! I've been a fan of the CyberShots for quite some time now and this one does not disappoint. All of the available features can be overwhelming at first but after you get used to its capabilities and how to find and use the, you'll love the outcome. One note -- if you attempt to use the iPad camera adapter to transfer photos from the camera to an iPad or iPhone, be sure to turn the USB power option "Off" in the menu settings before attempting to transfer otherwise the iPad/iPhone will give you an error message. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: B. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX10V Red.
customer_reviews.text: It is a cool camera. I liked it. I had a Sony camera DSC-W150 before I bought this one. I am very familiar with its features and photo information. I bought the newer model with Sony camera and the pictures came out with better picture quality. I am happy with it so far. I just bought it last month.[[ASIN:B006K551TO Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX200V 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Red) (2012 Model)] from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera actually has many more features than I was even looking for. Very functional for almost any pic you would want to take for the novice photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cameras I have ever owned. Takes great movies too. I bought one for a friend, and I should have bought 2 because my husband prefers it to his DSLR and now I'm out a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Phipps

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera to cover all my expectations, the functions are easy to handle and the result is fantastic. the shipping was fast and product arrived in excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: Byron Maya

customer_reviews.title: Really great vacation shots
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fast camera, though the writing to the flash card seems a bit slow. I did buy the premium memory card that supposedly writes 45GB/sec, but the camera does not seem to be able to keep up anywhere near that speed. Otherwise, the camera has outstanding features, and takes beautiful shots. The GPS is an added bonus, though it did not always capture a strong enough signal to get a proper fix. I was disappointed at some of the manual settings, but then if that's what you're after, you really should be looking at SLRs, not these smaller units. All in all, highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: the greatest
customer_reviews.text: This camera has it all . it does so much more than i ever expected from a small camera without all the extra lenses and gadgets that I'm amazed the pictures c9meoutn perfect no matter where or hown I take them . it's like magic
customer_reviews.author: Ron Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a purse sized camera with excellent zoom, then this is terrrific camera. We use it to take pics of our 3 small children- who are always on the move. This camera always takes clear photos even when the subjects are not holding still. The only drawback is that it takes about 8-10 seconds between shots, especially when using the flash.
customer_reviews.author: mamma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all purpose camera
customer_reviews.text: I have used the previous models and find this equally easy to use or if you wish you can set the camera for more specific needs. The zoom is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: David in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Sony Camera
customer_reviews.text: Just received this camera last night and it is great. The pictures are crystal clear and it was shipped immediately after my purchase. Thank you, Hopefully it stays it great working order.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morales

customer_reviews.title: Big Camera small body
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera for everyday and travel. Fits in a pocket or purse. Good lens and great optical zoom. Lots of auto settings as well as some manual. Good battery life so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Boyd-oliver

customer_reviews.title: very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Still testing but have a few hundred shots and very impressed and happy with the product. Would buy again. Very vivid colors and good focusing. steady at max zoom with clear shots. excellent travel camera
customer_reviews.author: peterj

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pics
customer_reviews.text: Still learning about this camera. I like it a lot and it does take very good pics. Very satisfied with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Komal Kowlessar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: A great little camera for the money! I bought it to use for my Real Estate business, needing a camera with at least a 24mm lens for wide room shots and this is perfect. It also does very well in dim lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Singinstacy

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this camera. The pictures are very crisp and clear. There are a lot of features on it so I am happy with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, loaded with features
customer_reviews.text: A learning curve required to master the ins and outs. Also the pop up flash makes it awkward to hold the camera to take photos
customer_reviews.author: Quicksilver gal

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUT NOT GREAT CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera. Now we wish wed done more research first. The GPS feature is not great. Our friend has a Panasonic that told us the STREET NAMES when we were in Europe. This camera only gave us map coordinates. The GSP feature also drains the battery very fast. The panoramic feature is great and so are the display features. But we think now we could have done better?
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Rassushin

customer_reviews.title: Love My cybershot!
customer_reviews.text: It has all the features I was looking for in a small camera. The quality of photos is exceptional and others are also impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Budzen

customer_reviews.title: Cyber-shot
customer_reviews.text: Like most Sony products it performs as advertised. I'm still low on the learning curve, but have already gotten some excellent pictures. I got the camera primarily for the Geotracking GPS features: seems to lock fairly quickly, the indication of lock or "lack of" might be a little better. For the zoom range it is a small cameria, easy to tote arround or drop in a pocket. The small size makes the pop up flash problematic. I prefer the flash on my wife's panasonic DMC pocket camers....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this camera! My only issue is the optical zoom is not great, but if you are looking for a general purpose all around family type camera, you will not be disappointed in this one!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hann

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: I like Sony but I just didn't like the feel or use of the camera. Sorry, not for me. I liked the dual shot option while in video mode.
customer_reviews.author: sa

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: beautiful photos. easy to to use. easy to carry around. easy to charge. beautiful shape. will recommend anybody to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Been playing with camera. Color options are fun to p,ay with (only reds, yellows, greens, etc) right from camera. Zoom is good. My favorite thing is it takes GREAT action shots. I got a pict of my daughter batting- you can see the ball right on the end of the bat, not crystal clear, but you can see its a round ball. The only thing I don't like is it has no micro for close ups of flowers etc. good camera overall. Glad I bought this one
customer_reviews.author: Penny Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: got it faster than i thought, right on time and works excellent, takes great pictures. Definitely was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alonso Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Sony Sybershot HX10V is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing photo and video quality and the best one is recording and taking picture simultaneously! The only drawback of HX10V is the position of flash on the top-left corner, especially when you ask someone else to take picture for you, you should either ask him to expect the flash to be jumped up, or the other guy will be surprised and most probably saying "what the hell was that!"
customer_reviews.author: Hamed P

customer_reviews.title: great pics
customer_reviews.text: the quality of every single picture is really good. you can tell when you see that when you notice that a simple picture requires about 5mgs of space
customer_reviews.author: JVJVJVZZZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Nice pictures and excellent videos. 100% satisfied with my purchase. Very good zoom, flash light and easy menu.
customer_reviews.author: Nando

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you want everything yellow
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a pocket point and shoot. I have used DSLR cameras so I expect quite a bit from a camera. I had a fuji HS20 and loved the pictures that it took but the camera is too large for walks with my kiddos. I bought the Sony based on reviews. It did not live up to any expectation that I had for the camera. Blurry pics, yellow photos were all I could get. I tried to adjust its "white balance" to try to improve the warmth (yellowness) of the photos and it did very little to help. It is being returned to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Davis

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX10V 18.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Black) (2012 Model)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackCapture the decisive moment and its GPS location automatically with the DSC-HX10V. Its 16X Optical/32X Clear Image zoom gets you in close for detailed 18MP pictures, provides optical stabilization for smooth Full HD videos and high speed AF. Photo Creativity lets you preview exposure, white balance, and Picture Effects before you shoot. Background Defocus - DSLR photographs are often beautiful because they blur the background, putting the emphasis on the subject GPS and Compass - GPS and compass record location data and camera direction as you shoot movies and photos. GPS Log lets users track a photographic journey and later view the path and images on a map Intelligent Scene Recognition Mode - Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects 33 different types of scenes and selects the appropriate camera settings 3D Still Image & Panorama - The camera takes 15 images at different angles as it sweeps across the scene. By tilting the camera during playback, the camera's Gyro Sensor detects motion and displays the image in a 3D-like view on the camera's LCDSpecifications Sensor Size / Total Pixels / Filter - 1/2.3-inch Exmor R CMOS / 18.9 Total Megapixels / RGB Primary Color Filter Effective Pixels - 18.2 Megapixels Lens - Sony G Optical Zoom - 16x Focal Length (35mm equivalent) - Still 16 - 9 - 26-416mm / Still 4 - 3 - 24-384mm / Movie 16 - 9 - 25-400mm(SteadyShot Standard), 26-546mm(SteadyShot Active) / Movie 4 - 3 - 31-496mm(SteadyShot Standard), 32-672mm(SteadyShot Active) Steady Shot Mode Active - Yes LCD - 3.0 Xtra Fine LCD Display (921K dots) Storage Media - Optional MS DUO/PRO DUO/PRO HG DUO & SD/SDHC/SDXC media Still Image Size - Up to 16 - 9 13M(4,896 2,752) / 4 - 3 18M(4,896x3672) Video Mode - Up to AVCHD 60i - 24M FX/ 17M FH(1,920 x 1,080/60i) / Video Mode - AVCHD 60i - 24M FX/ 17M FH(1,920 x 1,080/60i) / 3M VGA(640 x 480/30fps) ISO - Auto, 1

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

SONY CYBER-SHOT DSC-HX10V 18.2 MP DIGITAL CAMERA WITH 16X OPTICAL ZOOM AND 3.0-INCH LCD 

 * Capture 18.2 MP ultra-high definition images
   
 * High speed AF improves focus speed
 * Get up close with 16x optical/32x Clear Image zoom1
 * Full HD 1080/60i with dual record of stills and movies1
   
 * Capture the decisive moment with up to 10fps
   
 * Optical Image stabilization with improved active mode4
 * 3D still image and 3D Sweep Panorama mode3
 * Picture Effect for more expressive photos
   
 * Photo Creativity allows easy photo adjustments 
   
 * Background Defocus highlights your subject like a DSLR
   










































Capture every moment and its GPS location automatically with the Sony DSC-HX10V. It's 16x optical/32x Clear Image zoom gets you closer for detailed 18.2 MP pictures, while optical stabilization provides for smooth Full HD videos and high speed AF. Enjoy features such as Photo Creativity, which lets you preview exposure, white balance, and Picture Effects before you shoot.



KEY FEATURES

18.2 MEGAPIXEL EXMOR R CMOS IMAGE SENSOR
The 18.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor captures ultra-high definition images that take full advantage of the camera’s sharp Sony G lens. The sensor enables advanced processing that reduces noise levels, resulting in stunning low light images with incredible details.


HIGH SPEED AF

To improve focusing speed and sensitivity, the Exmor R CMOS sensor uses its rapid throughput to deliver high-quality image signals to the camera’s BIONZ processor. The result is fast, DSLR-like focusing speeds, even in low light.


OPTICAL ZOOM PLUS CLEAR IMAGE ZOOM

Most digital zooms use electronic cropping to get closer to the subject, resulting in unsharp images. With Clear Image Zoom the powerful processor compares patterns found in adjacent pixels and creates new pixels to match selected patterns, resulting in more realistic, higher-quality images. Clear Image Zoom doubles optical zoom for closer photos.

FULL HD 1080/60I

Record crystal clear movies at the highest resolution available with capabilities for 60i in 1080 AVCHD video.1 This provides stunning, fast motion video with less distortion for playback on your HD TV.2 With dual record of stills and movies, you can shoot both at the same time.

CAPTURE THE DECISIVE MOMENT WITH UP TO 10FPS

Capture full 18.2 megapixel resolution images at up to 10 frames per second, helping to ensure that the decisive moment is captured such as the soccer ball flying into the goal. In addition, a mechanical shutter helps reduce distortion when continuously shooting moving subjects. 
OPTICAL STEADYSHOT WITH ACTIVE MODE

Optical SteadyShot with Active Mode for blur-free movies even while walking.4 Camera-shake compensation using Optical SteadyShot/Active Mode has been improved with the addition of new electronic image stabilization.Now it’s easier than ever to obtain sharp, blur-free movies even when zooming in unsteady situations, such as shooting with one hand while walking. 

3D STILL IMAGE AND 3D SWEEP PANORAMA MODE3

Produce awe-inspiring images with 3D still image and 3D Sweep Panorama capabilities.3 Photos will take on a new dimension of creative capabilities for viewing the world in a whole new way.

BACKGROUND DEFOCUS

DSLR photographs are often beautiful because they blur the background, putting the emphasis on the subject. Now our point-and-shoot cameras can deliver this signature DSLR benefit. The system takes two shots, identifies the background and applies a defocused background keeping the subject crisp and clear.

PICTURE EFFECT FOR MORE EXPRESSIVE PHOTOS 

Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. Select camera models have up to nine different effects. 
PHOTO CREATIVITY
Photo Creativity allows you to fine-tune your exposure settings, such as brightness, color, and vividness, and quickly choose the right enhancement for your subject. Now you can view Picture Effects and Photo Creativity effects in real time on the camera’s monitor or in the viewfinder before shooting. 
SUPERIOR AUTO MODE

Get cleaner, more dynamic pictures and fewer missed shots. The DSC-HX10V automatically recognizes the correct scene mode, then quickly shoots and combines up to six shots to produce images with greater clarity, optimum dynamic range using backlight correction HDR technology and lower image noise using 6 shots layering technology. Superior Auto intelligently detects 33 scenes for still images and movies, making it easy to get the best shot. 

FACE DETECTION TECHNOLOGY 

Face Detection technology recognizes faces and optimizes camera settings for both video and still images, so faces are captured more clearly and skin tones look more natural.


SMILE SHUTTER TECHNOLOGY 


Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority andindicate the degree of Smile Detection sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting. 


GPS AND COMPASS

GPS and compass record location data and camera direction as you shoot movies and photos. GPS Log lets users track a photographic journey and later view the path and images on a map. Map View in “PlayMemories Home” software, allows users to view images on a map showing where they were taken. The logged path and images can also be displayed on Google Earth. 
ANTI-BLINK FUNCTION 

It’s frustrating to capture the perfect shot, only to review it later and discover subjects blinked during the photo. The Anti-blink function works to help counter blinking and squinting. When the camera is set to Soft Snap, the Anti-blink function captures two images, recording only the photo with less squinting. If a blink is detected in other shooting modes, a warning will be displayed after you take the shot.

SOFT SKIN MODE

Portrait subjects will love the results. Soft Skin mode recognizes skin tones and reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles without affecting the rest of the shot.

INTELLIGENT SCENE RECOGNITION (ISCN) MODE

Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects 33 different types of scenes and, within just 1/30th of a second, selects the appropriate camera settings. iSCN has two modes: Auto and Advanced. In Auto Mode, the camera takes a single shot using the optimal settings. In Advanced Mode, the camera takes a photo with the optimal settings and, if in difficult lighting (low light or back light) immediately takes a second photo with another optimized setting so you can choose which to keep.

NATURAL FLASH

Conventional point-and-shoot camera flash shots just don't capture colors the way the eye sees them. Natural Flash mode takes a reference shot without flash and then uses that reference to correct the color, for far more lifelike images.

MOTION DETECTION

Motion Detection, along with Face Motion Detection adjusts ISO sensitivity and increases the shutter speed when movement is detected, reducing blur in moving subjects and faces.

SWEEP MULTI ANGLE MODE

In Sweep Multi Angle mode, the DSC-HX10V takes 15 images at different angles as it sweeps across the scene. By tilting the camera during playback, the camera’s Gyro Sensor detects motion and displays the image in a 3D-like view on the camera’s LCD.

 * 
 * 

1. Records in 29 minute segments 
2. Requires HDTV and HDMI cable sold separately
3. Requires 3D HDTV, HDMI cable (at least 10.2 Gbps) and active 3D glasses sold separately.
4. Combined with electronic stabilization

High speed AF improves focus speed
